ch.iserver.ace.application
Interface ApplicationController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationControllerImpl
public interface ApplicationController

The Application Controller is the central class handling application level events like for instance quit, showing different dialogs, saving, opening, and closing documents.

The ApplicationController is further used by Customizer classes. For instance on Mac OS X some methods in this interface are used to improve the user experience on OS X.

Method Summary
 void closeAllDocuments()
          Closes all the documents.
 void closeDocument()
          Closes the currently selected document, if any.
 void discoverUser()
          Shows a dialog which lets the user enter an IP address of another user.
 void openDocument()
          Shows a file open dialog which lets the user choose one or more files to open in new editor documents.
 void openFile(String filename)
          Opens the passed in file in a new editor document.
 void quit()
          Terminates the application.
 void saveAllDocuments()
          Saves all the open and changed files.
 void saveDocument()
          Saves the currently selected document.
 void saveDocumentAs()
          Saves the document under another name.
 void saveDocumentCopy()
          Saves a copy of the currently selected document to a file.
 void showAbout()
          Shows the applications about dialog.
 void showPreferences()
          Shows the preferences dialog.
 

Method Detail

showAbout

void showAbout()
Shows the applications about dialog.

showPreferences

void showPreferences()
Shows the preferences dialog.

openFile

void openFile(String filename)
Opens the passed in file in a new editor document.

Parameters:
filename - the filename of the file to open

quit

void quit()
Terminates the application. An implementation will typcially ask the user about unsaved changes, thus this method does not have to result in a shutdown because the user might cancel the shutdown process.

closeDocument

void closeDocument()
Closes the currently selected document, if any. The user should be asked to save unsaved changes.

closeAllDocuments

void closeAllDocuments()
Closes all the documents. The user should be asked to save unsaved changes.

openDocument

void openDocument()
Shows a file open dialog which lets the user choose one or more files to open in new editor documents.

saveDocument

void saveDocument()
Saves the currently selected document. If the document has never been saved before, this method typically asks the user to set the filename in a file save dialog.

saveDocumentAs

void saveDocumentAs()
Saves the document under another name.

saveDocumentCopy

void saveDocumentCopy()
Saves a copy of the currently selected document to a file.

saveAllDocuments

void saveAllDocuments()
Saves all the open and changed files.

discoverUser

void discoverUser()
Shows a dialog which lets the user enter an IP address of another user. After this dialog closes, an explicit discovery request is started.
